trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems> event occurs when a new area of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> in virtual mode is exposed and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> determines a new range of items is needed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems>evento si verifica quando una nuova area di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>in modalità virtuale è esposto e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>determina un nuovo intervallo di elementi necessari.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified starting and ending indices.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs"> </xref> classe con lo specificato indici iniziale e finale.

trans-unit.source: The starting index of a range of items needed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> for the next <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"></xref> event that occurs.
trans-unit.target: Indice iniziale di un intervallo di elementi necessita per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> per i prossimi <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"> </xref> evento che si verifica.

trans-unit.source: The ending index of a range of items needed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> for the next <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"></xref> event that occurs.
trans-unit.target: Indice finale di un intervallo di elementi necessita per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> per i prossimi <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"> </xref> evento che si verifica.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ending index for the range of values needed by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice finale per l'intervallo di valori necessari per un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controllo in modalità virtuale.

trans-unit.source: The range of values specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.StartIndex%2A> and EndIndex properties represents the range of values most likely needed by a virtual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control for the next occurrence of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event.
trans-unit.target: L'intervallo di valori specificato nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.StartIndex%2A>EndIndex proprietà e rappresenta l'intervallo di valori molto probabilmente necessari per una macchina <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllo per l'occorrenza successiva di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.StartIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index at the end of the range of values needed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: L'indice alla fine dell'intervallo di valori necessari per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting index for a range of values needed by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice iniziale per un intervallo di valori necessari per un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controllo in modalità virtuale.

trans-unit.source: The range of values specified by the StartIndex and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.EndIndex%2A> properties represents the range of values most likely needed by a virtual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control for the next occurrence of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event.
trans-unit.target: L'intervallo di valori specificato dal parametro StartIndex e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.EndIndex%2A>rappresenta l'intervallo dei valori molto probabilmente necessari virtuale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllo per l'occorrenza successiva di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.EndIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index at the start of the range of values needed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: L'indice all'inizio dell'intervallo di valori necessari per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controllo.
